Key Match Events: Khris Middleton scored just eight points against the Spurs after being moved to the bench.
Doc Rivers explained his decision to bench Middleton following the game against the Spurs.
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers stated that Middleton's health is not improving to the desired level, leading to the decision to cut his minutes and monitor his condition.
The move to bench Middleton signals the end of his era as a key player for the Bucks.
Others: Taurean Prince has been inserted into the starting lineup to help the Bucks on defense.
More pressure will now be applied to Giannis Antetokounmpo and Damian Lillard to carry the offensive burden for the Bucks.
